data.title: Support the Academy
data.meta_description: Discover all the ways you can support the Academy, from membership, to planned giving, to corporate sponsorship.
data.text:
Support Academy science while cultivating your curiosity all year long with unlimited museum admission, exclusive programming, discounted tickets, shopping, dining, and more. Memberships start at $99.

Our donors make it possible for the Academy to shine as a science leader in California and around the world. Be a partner in our mission and help advance our major initiatives with a gift of $1,500 or more.

By naming the Academy as a beneficiary of your will, trust, retirement funds, or other assets today, your legacy will provide for the people and places you value most in the future.

Inspire your employees with unlimited Academy admission, private tours, and more, while aligning your business with cutting-edge research, education, and sustainability initiatives.

The Academy is proud to work with a diverse group of local and national foundations, grantmaking organizations, and government partners in providing vital support for our programs.

Party with a purpose at the Academy's two annual fundraiser events: Spring's Big Bang Gala features inspiring presentations, epic entertainment, and dazzling decor, while fall's SuperNatural is when spirits of all ages are invited to haunt the museum's halls.

Commemorate your family's long-standing connection to the Academy in a unique way. Whether on a decorative plaque or a special seat in Morrison Planetarium, your name will be displayed thoughtfully to celebrate your legacy.

Engage with a community of science-lovers while picking up new skills and knowledge. From helping visitors explore and understand our exhibits to diving in our aquarium tanks, there's an exciting volunteer opportunity to match nearly every interest.
